title: Mindful Breathing 101
information:
Welcome to Mindfulness 101.

This 3 day introduction course will start you on the path to improving your mindfulness.

Like all our programs, we recommend combining Mindfulness Introduction with regular meditation.

If you have any feedback please don’t hesitate to reach out. We are continually developing additional courses and adjusting our existing offerings based on feedback from people like you.

Please Enjoy!

exercises.title: Attention to the Breath
exercises.copy:
Sit upright in a chair or cross-legged on the floor. Use a cushion if you wish. Besides sitting upright, body position is not important.

When you are ready, press the button, close your eyes and notice the natural rhythm of your breath.

exercises.title: Inhalation and Exhalation
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and narrow your attention to the rising and falling of your chest as you breathe.

exercises.title: Tip of the Nose
exercises.copy:
Narrow your attention to the sensation of air flowing in and out through the nose as you breathe.

✏️ Tip: Keeping a mental count of your breaths can help narrow your attention.

exercises.title: Returning to the Breath
exercises.copy: Close your eyes and focus on your breathing. When you notice you’ve become distracted, gently acknowledge the distraction with a smile, then return to your breathing practice.

exercises.title: ⭐ Mindful Breathing
exercises.copy:
Press the question mark above to refresh your memory on the fundamentals of mindful breathing.

1. Sit upright in a comfortable position
2. Direct your focus on your breath
3. Choose a breathing focal point
4. Come back when distracted
